tool_description: Aspose.CAD Cloud allows developers to convert CAD drawings such as DWG, DWF and DXF to PDF and Raster images. It is a REST API so does not require AutoCAD or any software to be installed. You can also convert the selected layers and layouts from the CAD drawings. The conversion to PDF and Raster images is of very high quality.
name: Aspose.CAD Cloud
title: Aspose.CAD Cloud

api_list.name: GetFilesList
GetDrawingResize

optional_parameters.name: outPath
optional_parameters.description: Path to updated file (if this is empty, response contains streamed file).

optional_parameters.name: folder
optional_parameters.description: Folder with a drawing to process.

api_list.name: GetDrawingProperties

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: Filename of an input drawing on a storage.

optional_parameters.name: folder
optional_parameters.description: Folder with a drawing to get properties for.

api_list.name: GetDrawingRotateFlip

required_parameters.name: rotateFlipType
required_parameters.description: Rotate/flip operation to apply. Possible values: RotateNoneFlipNone, Rotate90FlipNone, Rotate180FlipNone, Rotate270FlipNone, RotateNoneFlipX, Rotate90FlipX, Rotate180FlipX, Rotate270FlipX, RotateNoneFlipY, Rotate90FlipY, Rotate180FlipY, Rotate270FlipY, RotateNoneFlipXY, Rotate90FlipXY, Rotate180FlipXY, Rotate270FlipXY

optional_parameters.name: folder
optional_parameters.description: Folder with a drawing to process.

optional_parameters.name: outPath
optional_parameters.description: Path to updated file (if this is empty, response contains streamed file).

ObjectExists

required_parameters.name: path
required_parameters.description: File or folder path e.g. '/file.ext' or '/folder'

Exists.description: Indicates that the file or folder exists.

IsFolder.description: True if it is a folder, false if it is a file.

api_list.name: GetDiscUsage
GetFileVersions

IsFolder.description: True if it is a folder.

ModifiedDate.description: File or folder last modified DateTime.

IsLatest.description: Specifies whether the file is (true) or is not (false) the latest version of an file.
